member.name: WICComponentEnumerateOptions.WICComponentEnumerateDefault
member.summary: Enumerate any components that are not disabled. Because this value is 0x0, it is always included with the other options.

member.name: WICComponentEnumerateOptions.WICComponentEnumerateRefresh
member.summary: Force a read of the registry before enumerating components.

member.name: WICComponentEnumerateOptions.WICComponentEnumerateDisabled
member.summary: Include disabled components in the enumeration. The set of disabled components is disjoint with the set of default enumerated components

member.name: WICComponentEnumerateOptions.WICComponentEnumerateUnsigned
member.summary: Include unsigned components in the enumeration. This option has no effect.

member.name: WICComponentEnumerateOptions.WICComponentEnumerateBuiltInOnly
member.summary: At the end of component enumeration, filter out any components that are not Windows provided.
